about_the_game:
The Fantasy Outfit Pack will make Monster Camp look like a TTPRPG session. Behold Bard Calculester's golden abs or Paladin Aaravi's thicc armor thighs.
You can activate the outfits when customizing your Monster Camp matches.
So, get your party ready and venture into the depths of the most challenging quest ever: finding a summer love.

content_descriptors.notes: Use of mature language in a humorous way.

detailed_description:
